entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
